snippet: One trip around Augusta National as a competitor was enough for the 30-year-old Edoardo Molinari, who finished at plus-11. He said he was not going to return to the course to be a fan in his brother's gallery.
abstract: One trip around Augusta National as a competitor was enough for the 30-year-old Edoardo Molinari, who finished at plus-11. He said he was not going to return to the course to be a fan in his brother's gallery.

headline.main: Edoardo Molinari Has Had Enough of the Masters
